metadata.name: Capturer of Greedy Souls
metadata.description: He wanders the vastness of the universe in search of weak souls and scatters his golden shards from planet to planet. Creatures worship the shards as priceless idols and surrender their souls to the treacherous creature. When the time comes, he takes with him souls perverted by the sin of greed and profit. Their fate is the terrible payment for their sins, long into eternity...
